description: Property-graph schema for investigative OSINT: nodes (websites, emails, phones, usernames, passwords, companies, people, addresses, vehicles, art, IP, etc.) and typed, directional relationships with provenance and temporal qualifiers. Extensions v1.1: expanded nodes/edges for network, finance, trust, logistics, media, social, repos, and geography.

conventions.email_normalization: lowercase local@domain; punycode for IDN domains
conventions.domain_normalization: lowercase FQDN; punycode for IDN; no trailing dot
